Opensim Module¶

The opensim module provides synchronization between avatars and profiles, region management with visual map support, decentralized iar/oar(luggage and scenes) management and centralized simulator configuration-loading.

Code References¶

classmethod render_cell(x, y, image_loc=None)[source]¶

Render a specific cell on the worldmap, based on a fixed start-z

Parameters:
  • x (int) – the x grid-location on the worldmap to render
  • y (int) – the y grid-location on the worldmap to render
  • image_loc (str) – Optional; where to get the image from(region map-tile uri for instance). Empty fills with a not-available image

services.web_ui.controllers.ws.maps¶

The websocket logics for the map. This is either going to the opensim module, or some code is going from the opensim module. It stays here until then.

read_cell(client, lonlat)[source]¶

Get the position of the client’s mouseclick in the map, and return region information if there is a region at that location

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • lonlat (list) – The world-coordinates to lookup
Returns:

dict - Coordinate data containing region-information if related
